name: Audio on Canvas
description:
FULL SCREEN REQUIRED FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

Let your artistic spontaneity shine in this expressive rhythm game where you can paint to the beat on whatever part of the canvas to create your own masterpiece! 

Prototype built during GD6, with the hope of turning it into The Musical Canvas Expo for the Gotland Game Conference 2023. Stay tuned for more info! 

Credits (WIP):

Robin Ahlgren: Assistant Programmer, UI, Charting

Simon Peyda Moore: Composer

Dani-Alys Rizal:  Game Director, Lead Programmer
